meanings.sent1: The young cricketer bowled a perfect leggie to confuse the batsman.
meanings.sent2: The leggie bowled by the spinner spun sharply and took the wicket.
meanings.sent3: The leggie was so tricky that the batsman ended up hitting his own wicket!
meanings.sent4: The leggie danced around the batsman's defense like a whirlwind.
meanings.sent5: The leggie delivery was as unpredictable as the weather in spring.

meanings.definition: A type of dance move involving movement of the legs.
meanings.sent1: She impressed everyone with her smooth leggie on the dance floor.
meanings.sent2: The dance routine included a challenging leggie that required flexibility.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at the leggie made everyone laugh as he stumbled and tripped.
meanings.sent4: Her leggie was so graceful, it seemed like she was floating on air.
meanings.sent5: The leggie move added a touch of elegance to the performance.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled at using their legs in a particular activity.
meanings.sent1: The soccer player was known as a leggie for his powerful kicks.
meanings.sent2: She was a leggie in ballet, executing every move with precision.
meanings.sent3: The leggie in the race sprinted ahead with lightning speed.
meanings.sent4: He was a leggie in climbing, scaling the rock wall effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The leggie skater glided across the ice with grace and ease.
